text: We took a last minute road trip Friday afternoon.  My package arrived after we left.  Sunday afternoon when we came back home, we noticed the white Amazon package was in the middle of the driveway, along with the candy wrappers (empty) which were also all over the driveway, yard and neighbors yard!  I wish I took a picture, but I wanted to clean it up before the neighbors got home!  Apparently our raccoon friends (we have 3-4) celebrated Halloween early!  And who could blame them?!  The dog found one M&M!  I couldn't get mad!  It was too funny!  Hope they were not to strung out on sugar!  Happy Halloween!  🦝🦝🦝😆🤣😅
